name: Renegade

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally RESIST in all Battles by 40.

skills.name: Lingering Pain
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 25% chance of placing a 100% [Heal Reduction] debuff for 1 turn.
Damage based on: [ATK] [SPD]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%

skills.name: Lash Out
skills.raw_description:
Attacks at random 3 times. Has a 50% chance of placing a 15% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns. Places a 25% [Decrease ACC] debuff for 2 turns if the target has any active buffs.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%

skills.name: Sacrificial Ritual
skills.raw_description:
Decreases the cooldown of all ally skills by 2 turns. This skill does not affect this Champion, or other Champions with this skill. This Champion will receive damage equal to 30% of their MAX HP. This will happen even if it kills this Champion.
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 3 Cooldown -1
